markets.guidance:
1x2

Predict what will be the result at *Full Time.

The following options are available:

  •  Home bet wins if Home team wins the match.
  •  Draw bet wins if the match without winners.
  •  Away bet wins if Away team wins the match.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: 1x2
markets.title: 1,X,2

markets.guidance:
Double chance

A Double Chance bet allows you to cover two of the three possible outcomes in the match with one bet.*Full Time

The following options are available:

  •  1X bet wins if the result is either home win or draw then bets on this option are winners.
  •  X2 bet wins if the result is either draw or away win then bets on this option are winners.
  •  12 bet wins if the result is either home win or away win then bets on this option are winners.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: Double chance

markets.guidance:
DNB

Predict which team will win the match. If the teams draw, selection will be voided.*Full Time

The following options are available:

  •  Home bet wins if Home team wins the match.
  •  Away bet wins if Away team wins the match.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: Draw no bet

markets.guidance:
Handicap

Predict the final result of the match taking in consideration the handicap in brackets.*Full Time

Handicap 1:0-Home team is getting advantage of 1 point

  •  Home bet wins if Home team wins with any number of points, or the match ends without winner.
  •  Draw bet wins if Away team wins with exactly 1 point.
  •  Away bet wins if Away team wins with at least 2 points.

Handicap 0:2-Away team is getting advantage of 2 points

  •  Home bet wins if Home team wins with 3 or more points.
  •  Draw bet wins if Home team wins with exactly 2 points.
  •  Away bet wins if Away teams wins the game, or loses with at most 1 point.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: Handicap
markets.title: 1,X,2

markets.guidance:

  •  Draw bet wins if Away team wins with exactly 1 point.
  •  Away bet wins if Away team wins with at least 2 points.

Handicap 0:2-Away team is getting advantage of 2 points

  •  Home bet wins if Home team wins with 3 or more points.
  •  Draw bet wins if Home team wins with exactly 2 points.
  •  Away bet wins if Away teams wins the game, or loses with at most 1 point.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: Handicap
markets.title: 1,X,2

markets.name: Handicap
markets.title: 1,X,2

markets.guidance:
Winning margin

Predict by how many points the winning team wins the match.*Full Time

The following options are available:

  •  Home by 11+ bet wins if Home wins Away 11 or more points.
  •  Home by 6-10 bet wins if Home wins Away 6-10 points.
  •  Home by 1-5 bet wins if Home wins Away 1-5 points.
  •  Draw bet wins if the teams draw.
  •  Away by 1-5 bet wins if Away wins Home 1-5 points.
  •  Away by 6-10 bet wins if Away wins Home 6-10 points.
  •  Away by 11+ bet wins if Away wins Home 11 or more points.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: Winning margin

markets.guidance:
Handicap

Predict what will the result be after the allotted handicap is applied to the score at Fulltime.*Regular Time

The following options are available(For example the allotted handicap is 0.5):

  •  Home(+0.5) bet wins if Home team wins with any points, or the match ends without winner at regular time.
  •  Away(-0.5) bet wins if Away team wins with at least 1 point.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its regular time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: Handicap

markets.guidance:
Handicap

Predict what will the result be after the allotted handicap is applied to the score at Fulltime.*Regular Time

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its regular time including all injury and stoppage time.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its regular time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: Handicap

markets.guidance:
O/U

Predict will the match have more or less score than the allotted Total line at *Full Time.

This market has 2 possible outcomes at *Full Time (FT) i.e. Over x.5 or Under x.5. For example (Ov/Un 42.5)

  •  Over 42.5 bet wins if there are 43 or more points scored.
  •  Under 42.5 bet wins if there are 42 or fewer points scored.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: O/U
markets.title: Points,Over,Under

markets.guidance:
O/U

Predict will the match have more or less score than the allotted Total line at *Full Time.

This market has 2 possible outcomes at *Full Time (FT) i.e. Over x.5 or Under x.5. For example (Ov/Un 42.5)

  •  Over 42.5 bet wins if there are 43 or more points scored.
  •  Under 42.5 bet wins if there are 42 or fewer points scored.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: O/U
markets.title: Points,Over,Under

O/U

markets.name: O/U
markets.title: Points,Over,Under

markets.guidance:
Home O/U

Predict will the home team have more or less scores than the allotted Total line at *Full Time

This market has 2 possible outcomes at *Full Time (FT) i.e. Over x.5 or Under x.5. For example (Ov/Un 31.5)

  •  Over 31.5 bet wins if Home team scores 32 or more points at full time.
  •  Under 31.5 bet wins if Home team scores 31 or less points at full time.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: Home O/U

markets.guidance:
Away O/U

Predict will the Away team have more or less scores than the allotted Total line at *Full Time

This market has 2 possible outcomes at *Full Time (FT) i.e. Over x.5 or Under x.5. For example (Ov/Un 31.5)

  •  Over 31.5 bet wins if Away team scores 32 or more points at full time.
  •  Under 31.5 bet wins if Away team scores 31 or less points at full time.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: Away O/U

markets.guidance:
Odd/Even

Predict odd or even total number of scores at *full time.

The following options are available:

  •  Odd bet wins if the match ends with an odd number of total scores - 1,3,5,7...
  •  Even bet wins if the match ends with an even number of total scores -0,2,4,6,8...

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: Odd/Even

markets.guidance:
HT/FT Result

Predict the result of a match both at the 1st half time and full time.

The following options are available:

  •  1/1 bet wins if Home team leads after the 1st half and also wins the match.
  •  1/X bet wins if Home team leads after the 1st half and match ends in draw.
  •  1/2 bet wins if Home team leads after the 1st half and the Away team wins the match.
  •  X/1 bet wins if the 1st half ends in draw and the Home team wins the match.
  •  X/X bet wins if the 1st half ends in draw and also the match ends in draw.
  •  X/2 bet wins if the 1st half ends in draw and Away team wins the match.
  •  2/1 bet wins if Away team leads after the 1st half and Home team wins the match.
  •  2/X bet wins if Away team leads after the 1st half and match ends in draw.
  •  2/2 bet wins if Away team leads after the 1st half and also wins the match.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its full time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: Halftime/fulltime

markets.guidance:
Highest scoring half

Predict which half will be the higher scoring half.*Half Time.

The following options are available:

  •  1st bet wins if the two teams scored more in the first half than in the second.
  •  2nd bet wins if the two teams scored less in the first half than in the second.
  •  Equal bet wins if the two teams scored as many points in the first half as in the second.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its first half time & second half time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: Highest scoring half

markets.guidance:
Point range

Predict where the number of total points will be in. *Regular time

The following options are available:

  •  0-27 bet wins if the number of total points is between 0-27.
  •  28-34 bet wins if the number of total points is between 28-34.
  •  35-41 bet wins if the number of total points is between 25-41.
  •  42-48 bet wins if the number of total points is between 42-48.
  •  49-55 bet wins if the number of total points is between 49-55.
  •  56-62 bet wins if the number of total points is between 56-62.
  •  63+ bet wins if the number of total points is 63 or more.

* Bets on this market are settled on the result of the match at the end of its regualr time including all injury and stoppage time.
markets.name: Point range
